name: Doodle God 8-bit Mania
description:
DOODLE GOD JUST GOT PIXELATED! Go back to the 80s in this addictive, ALL ages, puzzle world building game. Mix and match different element combinations to build the universe of your dreams. The entire game has been beautifully redrawn in pixel graphics with an awesome new 8-bit soundtrack that takes you back to the very beginning of video games. * NEW Pixel Graphics!
 * NEW 8-bit Sound track!
 * Mold fire, wind, earth and air to create the Universe.
 * Intuitive one-click game play encourages thoughtful, creative play
 * Hundreds of interesting, funny and thought-provoking quotes and sayings.
 * New achievements.
